<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/admin/law-firms/{lawFirmId}/provision-staff"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>

:::caution deprecated

This endpoint has been deprecated and may be replaced or removed in future versions of the API.

:::

Deprecated shim. Use generic provisioning with appropriate roles.
